property.name: offer_key
property.value: Read this scroll to learn the location of a Beasts Nest.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Find Beasts Nest

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Find Beasts Nest

property.name: description_key
property.value: Visit the Beasts Nest and mark it on your map. Enter at your own peril. A Demon Lord is guaranteed.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this errand to collect and return honey for a random farm reward.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Collect Honey Errand

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Collect Honey Errand

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect 3 jars of honey and return to any Trader. The Baker will use them and you will receive a random farm reward.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this errand to collect and return eggs for a random farm reward.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Collect Eggs Errand

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Collect Eggs Errand

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect a Baker's Dozen eggs and return to any Trader. The Baker will use them and you will receive a random farm reward.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this errand to collect and return Emerald Gemstones for first aid bandages, gunpowder, or food rewards.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Collect Emerald Gemstones

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Collect Emerald Gemstones Errand

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect 3 Emerald Gemstones and return to any Trader. The Alchemist will use them and you will receive first aid bandages, gunpowder, or food rewards.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: The King commands you to reach the Abbey and find out what the monks have discovered.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Find the Abbey.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Find the Abbey.

property.name: description_key
property.value: The monks have likely perished. You need to purge the Abbey and find the Abbot's quarters. If there is any information, that is where you will find it.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: The King commands you to reach the Ruins and find the source of the Chaos incursion.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Find the Elven Ruins.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Find the Elven Ruins.

property.name: description_key
property.value: The monks gave their lives finding this information. Purge the ruins and find more information, else their deaths be for naught.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: It is fitting that Karak Ungol be the lair of our enemy. The Dwarven Hold was the first to perish in the Chaos incursion.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Find Karak Ungol.

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Find Karak Ungol.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Find this faceless master. Cut the head from the snake.
